quiz.question: Your Full Name
quiz.correctMessage: Your full name is sensitive data. strangers who know your full name, can look up more information about you, like where you live or where you go to school.
quiz.incorrectMessages: ðŸ’¡Hint: Think about what people can look up if they know your full name, is this something you would want a stranger to have access to? ðŸ’¡

quiz.question: Your Birthday
quiz.correctMessage: People can use your birthday to guess passwords or pretend to be you online as some websites use your birthday to confirm your identity.
quiz.incorrectMessages: ðŸ’¡Hint: Think about where your birthday can be used in the internet, what information or accounts can a stranger access with your birthday? ðŸ’¡
